website_summaries.verdict: If you need a well-made car cover that's more likely to fit your SUV than standard options, you can't go wrong with this durable 5-layer model designed with SUVs in mind.
pros: Offers 5 layers of weatherproof protection and a soft fleece lining for added paint protection
Fits most SUVs – measures 182 inches L x 60 inches W x 58 inches H. Comes with a lock, storage bag, and 3-year warranty
cons: It's a bit on the higher end of the price spectrum, but not out of line considering it's quality and size

customer_reviews.title: NYC Protection
customer_reviews.text: I live in NYC. Bird poop, salt from the road in the winter, pollen, grime, vandals, etc. Most people do not have car covers on the street because it is illegal to cover your plates and registration. I modified it, cutting windows into it using an old shower curtain, contact cement and silicone. I've been doing this for the last month and its a pain in the butt, but my car is spotless. It has been 100% waterproof. It's good quality. I bought this one after the AUDEW turned out to not be waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: MDOM

customer_reviews.title: It fits very well and is easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very impressed with this car cover. It fits very well and is easy to put on and take off. The materials are very durable and looks like it will hold up very well during the fall and winter seasons along with protecting your car from minor scuff and scratches . It fits perfectly and appears to be very well made. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: LovingMom

customer_reviews.title: Deception
customer_reviews.text: If there are 5 layers to this cover they must be the thickness of a strand of hair. This cover is very thin and may last you one or two seasons depending on where you live. Don't be pulled in by the extra items as you may never use them. The cover will not fit back in the bag once used. It is sent to you vacuumed packed but once expanded you will struggle without success to store it back in the bag. The photos do not reflect the product, some photos show cover with side mirror casement and other photos without. So what are you really getting?
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Scratches car! Worst investment
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst car cover I’ve ever come in contact with. Upon unpacking I could immediately tell that it was of low quality. The interior side of the cover will leave microabrasions on your paint so BEWARE!! There are Velcro straps on each corner which if unaware will also scratch your car paint. This was the worse designed piece of crap and I can’t believe I wasted time with this. Do not try and save money and get a quality car cover that will save your car paint from scratches!! I have a brand new Subaru and if I can’t buff out the scratches the manufacturer will be hearing from me soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money for sub zero temps
customer_reviews.text: Not being able to garage my Jeep Patriot during Chicago's extreme deep freeze last week...I quickly bought this to try to help protect my car some. I loved how I could still remote start it without worrying out CO2 exhausts getting into the car. With the prolonged subzero temps..there were a couple times the remote started didnt work...but when i used the key...not only did it start, but my car didnt feel as freezing inside. While not a replacement for a garage...I'd definitely recommend if you have to leave your car out. Side note... its easier to unfold and put on car then fold back up to put in bag.
customer_reviews.author: sz514n

customer_reviews.title: Using it for hail protection
customer_reviews.text: It works great so far. Its a little tight though. Almost didnt fit around my Dodge Journey, even though the measurements were suppose to be a little over the actually vehicle size. Also, one of the magic tape straps was not sewn on. Easy fix for me. The frustrating part was the fit veing tight, cutting an antenna hole and trying to put it on in the wind lol! It wasnt as thick as I imagined it to be. A pita to dry out too. Needs lots of room. Im using this cover in tandem with pool floaty beds to keep the hail from causing too much damage to my car. Fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Awful straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps on this cover are AWFUL! I used it for the first time yesterday before a big storm rolled in, as soon as a huge gust of wind came the straps broke on two sides!! The straps are NOT sewn on and are flimsy garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit my Jeep Grand Cherokee perfectly. I didn’t even need to use the straps on the cover because it fits so well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBookLover

customer_reviews.title: 5 layers of BS
customer_reviews.text: OMG - spent a fair amount of time researching covers and this one looked like a great one for my needs, however once it arrived and I inspected it I was disappointed to see that it was NOT a 5-layer cover! Only two flimsy layers, and the inner one is definitely NOT cotton. I advise you to look elsewhere for your car cover as these folks can't be relied upon to deliver the advertised product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but looks really BAD
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my car that had to be parked outside in the elements - not even a car port!. When I first received it, it looked pretty good. FIt well. Fast forward 90 days ---The rain, wind and whatever has stretched this cover out so much, it now hits the ground on all for sides. If I didn't have the side mirrors to hold it up, the ends would be sitting in the dirt. It's saggy and ugly. It does keep tree leafs, pine needles and other tree debris out the the windshield wiper area, which is what I needed and it is still keeping water off the car but damn, it really looks like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality and design of the car cover. It was reasonably priced and is serving us well to cover a car that we are currently working on repairing but can not get into our garage. It delivered quickly and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferPHT

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product and would like a refund
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this car cover for one month. After 2 weeks the strap ripped off. After another 2 weeks it has holes in it. It does not stay on the car and we use a set of bungee cords to try to keep it on. Would not recommend this product and would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied - doesn’t compare to other covers.
customer_reviews.text: Using the sizing tool on Amazon, it was supposed to fit my SUV. It doesn’t. Far too tight. I have other brand covers that are cut to fit for my sports cars and I have not had this problem before, until now. Tossed it over one of my large cars and it wasn’t water proof for a recent storm, despite being advertised as being waterproof. Will be returning this product as it isn’t large enough for the vehicle and wasn’t waterproof when used on one of my large cars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: cover ripped
customer_reviews.text: purchased cover 12/2017, this cover already has two area's that are torn. One on the top, 3" and one on top of side mirror area. I am very careful when installing and removing cover. Live in California weather is fairly mild here? DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS COVER! I purchase another cover from a different vendor for my Acura, and it has been perfect, no ripped cover!
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: For tree sap protection
customer_reviews.text: We keep a car at our vacation home in Charleston SC and the car would be covered in tree sap from trees in the driveway. This keeps the car clean and fits like a glove. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyPrice

customer_reviews.title: For the price good deal
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect the best but serves the purpose to protect my vehicle. The cover is medium duty and has a fair market price. My overall is it's just ok but fits my budget and supports my need to at least save my paint and interior. The cover will lower the heat about 8-15 percent. As I said for the money a fair deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: company does not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in March 2018 so that we may leave our vehicle in Florida for 6 months. When we returned in October 2019, the cover was all ripped on one side and could not be used again. This cover was advertised with a 3 year warranty. I have written to KAKIT twice but have received no response. I would never purchase anything from this company as they do not honor the warranty and would not contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is of decent quality. Feels like good heavyweight material and seams appear to be stitched well. The free lock is just eye wash but didn't intend to use it anyway. Not waterproof but is water resistant. Has held up to our strong winds so far without coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpsteel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and confusing
customer_reviews.text: I verified that the measurements match my car, per Amazon's vehicle compatibility module. Unfortunately, it doesn't quite fit the car, leaving the tires exposed and a struggle to fit it properly. The instructions are in Chinese mostly - and the English instructions with pictures are extremely poor. The accessories to "tie" the car down make absolutely zero sense.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April 2018 for a project vehicle that is outside all the time, fit well and didn't blow off even in the Kansas winds but the top completely deteriorated in only 8 months. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: It slips right on, it stays on even in high winds, and it is lightweight. While it may be water-resistant it is not waterproof, but it dries so quickly in a light breeze it makes up for it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: I like how this product fit, how it fastened, the softness of the inner fablic and how it looked. BUT, I live in the desert (Las Vegas) and the cover only lasted 18 months before the areas exposed to the sun started to flake off. Should be for indoor use only...
customer_reviews.author: G. Heywood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUV COVER.....
customer_reviews.text: THE FIT IS A LITTLE TIGHT BUT THAT IS GREAT BECAUSE WHEN THE WIND BLOWS THE COVER STAYS ON !!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael austin

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof SUV cover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a '17 Ford Escape and this cover is perfect, goes down to the bottom of the rims. Water beads up and has a soft material inside. I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: mrlzrdguy

customer_reviews.title: Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It fits my 2014 NISSAN JUKE SL even with the rear spoiler. The car is garaged, but living south of Tampa,across the street from the Gulf. Salt still raises cane with the car
customer_reviews.author: William R Holmes

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit! nice weight to it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Subaru Forester. Nice and heavy. Just tuck one end and roll on the car. Fits like a bedsheet. I did not, however, receive the cable and lock. But I love it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Nice car cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the ford escape. Easy to put on and take off, seems very well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: number two pencil

customer_reviews.title: WHETHER RESISTANT.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this protect for my Grand Cherokee and it is whether resistant protect the leather interior from UV ray and heat it is a good product I Like it and the Price.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Kakit Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a good fit for 2018 Ford Escape. The strap that goes underneath and clips to the other side didn't even reach . Not even close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2010 Grand Cherokee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to keep my Grand Cherokee outside the garage to make room for my tractor with the snow plow, so far it has held up well in the wind, snow, and rain, I can tell more in the spring, it does fit my Jeep perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Rhode Island

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had $400.00 covers that didn’t fit as well, weren’t as easy to put on and take off (the license plate strap is ingenious), and weren’t waterproof like this one. I was lucky enough that the cover was almost an exact fit for my car. I would have given it 5 stars but one of the Velcro straps came off after the first use. Other than that this is truly a great car cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: We are storing a Kia Sportage at a storage facility. Got this cover to keep it clean. Fits good and stays on well though storms.
customer_reviews.author: linda shearer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Best with the help of another person putting it on and taking it off. Barely fits a 2006 Toyota Camry. It's great quality but also fairly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Chan

customer_reviews.title: AAA+ $@
customer_reviews.text: A very good cover for quality and price. I use it outside near ocean so covers don't last more than 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Inazuma Hiro

customer_reviews.title: Car cover
customer_reviews.text: Used to cover my car in the Caribbean , the cover only lasted for under 2 years, the heat and sun, weaken the cloth an started to rip.
customer_reviews.author: JFD

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this cover
customer_reviews.text: Horrible low quality product. Velcrow scratched my paint on the vehicle. Total piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Knucklzwrx

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Material much thinner than was ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Material much thinner than was indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: The cover is as described and will be put to test in the Midwest weather/elements.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It IS waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My Jeep was leaking every time it rained, this cover is Great! No more leaking. Easy to use and stays on through the worst storms.
customer_reviews.author: gayle johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the work, but is a little bulky to fold
customer_reviews.author: F. Costa

customer_reviews.title: I think the material isn’t the best. The straps broke as soon as I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: The car cover is OK, I think the material isn’t the best. The straps broke as soon as I tried to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: RON CUMMINGS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and just fit over my son's 2011 wrx sti. Nicer that the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Velcro tie downs do not work, faulty manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine for a 2017 Honda crv. However, the velcro straps that are "magic" according to the manufacturer are only magical if tearing right off the cover is what you're going for. Ive only had this cover for a couple months and 3 out of 4 corner velcro straps have torn off. They all just tore off the fabric while I was tightening them. Useless car cover, not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Japan Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Holds up well in the wind so far.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed. It has already had both snow and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. It has already had both snow and driving rain on it, and it had no problem staying on. I am truly relieved that this turned out so well.
customer_reviews.author: Glen M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am really pleased with this auto cover. It seems durable and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: W Miller

customer_reviews.title: easy on/off
customer_reviews.text: bought this so our farm kitties wouldn't scratch the new Subaru Crosstrek. Easy on/off - easier than making a bed!
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The cover fit perfectly and is easy to install. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cant be short like me to put it on, but it works great and kept my car cool from the Texas heat while I was gone!
customer_reviews.author: eccollections

customer_reviews.title: Tested Approved
customer_reviews.text: Rained a couple days after I received the cover. It performs as advertised, resisting rain and no chance of blowing off. Great car cover for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Matthews

customer_reviews.title: They need a more better surface
customer_reviews.text: The material that this is made from are not good for outdoor they like paper it tear very easily
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Will be using this company again😊
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast, efficient & on point. Great material As described. 😁
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: It’s working!
customer_reviews.text: Car cover fit the exact model of car and it’s working in the snow and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. The fit was very adjustable and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our Lexus RX350. Materials of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michal D. Forrester

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: dont waste your time and money. I wish people doing review should be honest and realistic in their comments. Too short for my grand cherokee. I tried it to my accord still short. Its probably for mini cooper or motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste
customer_reviews.text: Horrible description. Do not waste your money. Does not fit standard SUV. No buckle as described!
customer_reviews.author: katrina A Shull

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: It fits my car snugly and cannot be blown off by the winds or stolen by rif-raf. Want to protect my new car.
customer_reviews.author: Christine I

customer_reviews.title: Kept my car safe and clean during a brief outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my car safe and clean during a brief outdoor stay in the windy winter weather in the Colorado Rocky Mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: ... because the car is big - Works well - good
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit unwieldy to put on but Its because the car is big - Works well - good price
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this SUV cover. Five layers, durable, and they are very convenient to put on car. Real waterproof as I parked my car outside with this cover on rainy day, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee V George

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what SUV this is supposed to fit, but certainly did not fit either of ours. My husband and I have small SUVs, one of us has a Tesla Model X, by no means a large size SUV, this cover wouldn't even cover half of the car. The quality seems fine but I just can't see this fitting any car bigger than a tiny four door.
customer_reviews.author: ChefP

customer_reviews.title: so easy put it on myself
customer_reviews.text: We don't have garage to park our car,always have to park on busy crowd road,bought the car cover just in case anyone scratch my car accidentally.I followed the instructions,so easy put it on myself.Also don't want to get my car dirty when rainy days other cars driving by spit on my car.The last reason it's save time when snow comes,cover it up don't need to shovel the snow from car.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This “SUV” cover is very small,... didn’t fit my car at all!
customer_reviews.author: i'ma mom!

product_meta.title: KAKIT 5 Layers Universal SUV Cover Waterproof All Weather Heavy Duty Sun Protection Scratch Resistant for Automobiles Outdoor(Up to 180”)
feature_bullets: Universal Fit: Cover dimension is 180x62x60 inch. Please measure the length of your SUV before buying. Our full car cover fits well for SUV with length from 170 inch to 180 inch.

5 Layers Material: Made of 3 layers breathable non-woven fabric, which helps to accelerate the drying after rain. With water resistant layer in the middle to prevent the automobile from light rain. Innermost soft cotton protects car paint from scratch.
Outdoor Windproof: Elastic Strap at the bottom to ensure cover fits your car; Wind Gust Strap & Buckle at the bottom to protect car cover from blowing off, even in heavy wind.
What You Get: 1x Free Anti-theft Lock, 1xStorage Bag, 1xWindproof Buckle, 2xAntenna patch.
Service: 30 Days Money Back Warranty, 3 Years Warranty. If there is any problem, please feel free to contact us, we will make things right for you within 24 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
